description.value: You produce and store organic ink in your throat that you can deploy as a defensive measure. When you’re in an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.Gf0dltAXIpCzjMl0#aquatic-terrain]{aquatic} environment, you can take a standard action to vomit ink, creating darkness in a 20-foot radius. @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#darkvision]{Darkvision} can’t see through this darkness, but effects capable of seeing through fog, mist, or clouds—such as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.pTTkOytapCiNq7OH]{thermal-sensitive eyes}—can. After you use this ability, you can’t use it again until you take a 10-minute rest to recover Stamina.
